dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :DAYS_OF_SHIPMENT num_days, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') run_date FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_gid location_id, loc.location_name, UPPER(con.contact_gid), con.contact_gid contact_id, con.is_primary_contact is_primary, con.first_name, con.last_name, con.job_title, con.email_address, con.notes, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(a.last_used,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(a.last_used,'MM/DD/YYYY') last_used_date, (SELECT loc.country_code3_gid FROM shipment ship INNER JOIN location loc ON ship.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE ship.shipment_gid = a.shipment_gid) dest_country FROM location loc INNER JOIN contact con ON loc.location_gid = con.location_gid INNER JOIN (SELECT ss.location_gid, MAX(s.insert_date) last_used, MAX(s.shipment_gid) shipment_gid FROM shipment_stop ss INNER JOIN shipment s ON ss.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.start_time > sysdate - :DAYS_OF_SHIPMENT GROUP BY ss.location_gid) a ON loc.location_gid = a.location_gid ORDER BY 11 desc, 1 asc, 3 desc, 5 asc
